pages.text:
Events
Host Unforgettable Events at Riverside
Welcome to Riverside – The Heart of the River
, where every occasion is transformed into an unforgettable experience. Situated along the serene riverbanks, our property offers an idyllic setting perfect for a diverse range of events—from intimate family gatherings and joyous reunions to inspiring corporate retreats and elegant weddings. With breathtaking riverfront views, versatile event spaces, and exceptional on-site accommodations, Riverside is designed to bring people together in a scenic and relaxing environment.
Versatile Venues for Every Occasion
Riverside is equipped to host events of any size and nature, thanks to our knowledgeable team and ample capacity. Our magnificent Lodge, spanning an impressive 3,000 square feet, promises enchantment at every turn with its awe-inspiring river views. The Lodge comfortably accommodates gatherings of up to 100 guests and features a compact yet efficient kitchen, luxurious indoor accommodations, and inviting spaces beneath graceful palm trees for additional seating. For added convenience, six well-appointed rooms—each with its own bathroom—offer the perfect setting for preparation and relaxation.
For larger celebrations, the 4,000-square-foot Riverside Grand Hall stands proudly along the riverbank. This breathtaking venue can host up to 150 guests for ceremonies or 100 guests for elegant sit-down receptions. The Grand Hall boasts a spacious veranda and enchanting outdoor areas, creating a picturesque backdrop for riverside weddings or special events. Four beautifully appointed rooms and two generously sized bathrooms provide flexibility and comfort for bridal parties, while a dedicated preparation facility ensures every detail is attended to with care.
Family Reunions:
A Place to Reconnect and Celebrate
Our spacious grounds and diverse amenities offer the perfect setting for multigenerational family gatherings. Whether you envision an outdoor celebration by the river, a cozy gathering around the fire pit, or a formal dinner in our enclosed, temperature-controlled dining hall, Riverside provides flexible options to fit your family’s needs.
On-Site Accommodations:
Our RV Village and retreat lodging ensure every guest has a comfortable place to stay, making it easy for families to enjoy extended time together.
Fun & Recreation:
From pickleball courts and hiking trails to a refreshing pool and group-friendly activities, there’s something for everyone to enjoy.
Catering & Food Plans:
Take the stress out of meal planning with our on-property dining hall and optional meal plans, allowing your family to focus on quality time instead of cooking.
Corporate Retreats:
Inspire, Connect, and Recharge
Step away from the office and into a natural setting where teams can bond, strategize, and refresh. Riverside offers the ideal mix of productivity and relaxation for your next leadership retreat, team-building event, or corporate getaway.
Conference & Meeting Spaces:
Our enclosed, climate-controlled event spaces and outdoor gathering areas provide the perfect environment for brainstorming sessions, workshops, and networking.
Lodging & Accommodations:
Keep your team together with a variety of on-site lodging options, ensuring a fully immersive retreat experience.
Engaging Team Activities:
Encourage collaboration and creativity with activities like nature walks, pickleball tournaments, and fireside discussions.
On-Site Dining:
Fuel your team with customized meal plans served in our dining hall, offering delicious and hassle-free catering options tailored to your event’s needs.
Seamless Planning,
Uninterrupted Celebrations
Rain or shine, Riverside ensures your event proceeds without a hitch. Our refined dining hall serves as a larger alternative for unexpected weather, guaranteeing festivities continue uninterrupted. With dedicated spaces for preparation, flexible event layouts, and a team committed to your satisfaction, Riverside is ready to help you create lasting memories for every occasion.
Contact Us

About Us
The Story of Riverside
At Riverside – the heart of the river, we believe in celebrating the beauty of life through nature, connection, and adventure. Located on the scenic banks of the Caloosahatchee River in central Florida, our property was created as a refuge for those looking to escape the everyday hustle and embrace the tranquility of the outdoors.
Riverside is more than just a destination; it’s a place where the land, the water, and the people who gather here breathe life into every experience. For over 50 years, this sacred riverfront has been a haven for spiritual retreats, faith-based gatherings, and personal renewal. While the nature of those gatherings has evolved, the heart of Riverside remains unchanged—rooted in servant leadership, hospitality, and a deep respect for the experiences of every guest who steps onto this land.
This commitment to service extends across everything we do. Our RV Village reflects that spirit through well-kept sites, beautifully maintained roads, and thoughtful amenities that enhance the experience for every traveler. Whether it’s a complimentary load of laundry, a friendly match on the pickleball courts, a refreshing swim in the pool, or a quiet evening in the clubhouse, we ensure that every guest feels valued, heard, and at home.
Your Vision, Our Mission –
A Promise for Every Guest
Whether you’re here for a wedding, family reunion, corporate retreat, or personal getaway, our mission is simple: to bring your vision to life. Nowhere is this more important than in our wedding and event offerings, where dreams take center stage, and every detail matters. For the bride envisioning her perfect day, we make a solemn promise—to take her moment to heart, to honor her vision, and to do everything within our means to bring her dream celebration to life. Riverside is more than a venue; it’s a partner in creating unforgettable memories.
Seamless Experiences MAKE
Happy Guests
At Riverside, we believe the happiest guests are those whose experiences are seamless, effortless, and deeply personal. That’s why we take a people-first approach, listening closely to every inquiry, request, and need. Whether a guest is calling from Alabama, Wisconsin, or Michigan, we understand that every region, every background, and every individual comes with a unique set of expectations and preferences. From the first conversation to their last moment on the property, we adapt our language, our service, and our approach to make sure they feel seen, heard, and understood.
We do not see our guests as numbers or transactions—we see them as individuals with stories, needs, and dreams. Our philosophy is clear: we serve the guest; the guest does not serve us. That guiding principle shapes every interaction, ensuring that every person who visits Riverside—whether for a day, a weekend, or a lifetime—leaves feeling welcomed, valued, and deeply connected to this place we call home.
Riverside Mission
At Riverside – the heart of the river, we create a place where strangers become welcomed guests, hurried lives find stillness, and every visitor feels seen and valued. Here, anticipation meets assurance as we honor each guest’s vision with care and commitment.
We are a sanctuary where community and family are celebrated, friendships are formed, and faith is welcomed and explored. Rooted in a legacy of connection and service, we embrace our past while shaping a future filled with hospitality, celebration, and renewal.
More than just a destination, we are the true Riverside – the heart of the river—a place where moments become memories and every guest finds their place in something greater.
What Makes Us Unique?
Prime Riverfront Location: Our view from the levee of the river and access to natural areas provides endless opportunities for adventure and relaxation.
Diverse Experiences: Whether it’s an RV getaway, a dreamy wedding, or a restorative retreat, our multi-use property caters to every guest’s needs.
Community Focus: We thrive on building lasting relationships with our guests, partners, and local community, ensuring that every visit feels like coming home

Whether it’s a complimentary load of laundry, a friendly match on the pickleball courts, a refreshing swim in the pool, or a quiet evening in the clubhouse, we ensure that every guest feels valued, heard, and at home.
Your Vision, Our Mission –
A Promise for Every Guest
Whether you’re here for a wedding, family reunion, corporate retreat, or personal getaway, our mission is simple: to bring your vision to life. Nowhere is this more important than in our wedding and event offerings, where dreams take center stage, and every detail matters. For the bride envisioning her perfect day, we make a solemn promise—to take her moment to heart, to honor her vision, and to do everything within our means to bring her dream celebration to life. Riverside is more than a venue; it’s a partner in creating unforgettable memories.
Seamless Experiences MAKE
Happy Guests
At Riverside, we believe the happiest guests are those whose experiences are seamless, effortless, and deeply personal. That’s why we take a people-first approach, listening closely to every inquiry, request, and need. Whether a guest is calling from Alabama, Wisconsin, or Michigan, we understand that every region, every background, and every individual comes with a unique set of expectations and preferences. From the first conversation to their last moment on the property, we adapt our language, our service, and our approach to make sure they feel seen, heard, and understood.
We do not see our guests as numbers or transactions—we see them as individuals with stories, needs, and dreams. Our philosophy is clear: we serve the guest; the guest does not serve us. That guiding principle shapes every interaction, ensuring that every person who visits Riverside—whether for a day, a weekend, or a lifetime—leaves feeling welcomed, valued, and deeply connected to this place we call home.
Riverside Mission
At Riverside – the heart of the river, we create a place where strangers become welcomed guests, hurried lives find stillness, and every visitor feels seen and valued. Here, anticipation meets assurance as we honor each guest’s vision with care and commitment.
We are a sanctuary where community and family are celebrated, friendships are formed, and faith is welcomed and explored. Rooted in a legacy of connection and service, we embrace our past while shaping a future filled with hospitality, celebration, and renewal.
More than just a destination, we are the true Riverside – the heart of the river—a place where moments become memories and every guest finds their place in something greater.
What Makes Us Unique?
Prime Riverfront Location: Our view from the levee of the river and access to natural areas provides endless opportunities for adventure and relaxation.
Diverse Experiences: Whether it’s an RV getaway, a dreamy wedding, or a restorative retreat, our multi-use property caters to every guest’s needs.
Community Focus: We thrive on building lasting relationships with our guests, partners, and local community, ensuring that every visit feels like coming home
